title: Okonomiyaki
description: A savory Japanese pancake filled with cabbage and topped with flavorful sauces.
instructions: Mix flour, water, and eggs in a bowl until the batter is smooth.
Fold in the shredded cabbage and chopped green onions until they are evenly coated in the mixture.
Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Pour in one portion of batter and shape it into a thick pancake.
Cook for 4–5 minutes until the bottom is golden and firm, then flip carefully using a spatula.
Cook the other side for another 4 minutes, pressing lightly to help it cook evenly.
Transfer to a plate and drizzle with okonomiyaki sauce and mayonnaise in zigzag patterns before serving.
